DOC.brief_summary: This prospective chart review/data collection study natural orifice translumenal endoscopic surgery ( NOTES ) sleeve gastrectomy , include questionnaire administer throughout study . Subjects enrol intend transvaginal NOTES sleeve gastrectomy . Data collect review 12 month post-op .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion : 1 . Diagnosis morbid obesity BMI > 40 2 . Female , age 1875 3 . Mentally competent give inform consent 4 . Scheduled undergo transvaginal NOTES sleeve gastrectomy Exclusion : 1 . Pregnant woman 2 . BMI < 40
